meanings.definition: A ruling on a point of Islamic law given by a recognized authority.
meanings.sent1: The fatwas from the scholars help guide the community.
meanings.sent2: She sought a fatwas from the imam to clarify the religious matter.
meanings.sent3: The fatwas were like compasses pointing the way through the legal maze.
meanings.sent4: His fatwas were like beacons of wisdom shining in the darkness of uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The fatwas stood as pillars of knowledge in the mosque.

meanings.definition: A legal opinion or decree issued by a Muslim scholar.
meanings.sent1: The fatwas of the scholars were respected by all.
meanings.sent2: He presented his fatwas on the matter during the conference.
meanings.sent3: The fatwas seemed like magic spells, binding the community together.
meanings.sent4: Her fatwas were like keys unlocking the mysteries of the law.
meanings.sent5: The fatwas echoed through the halls of the university, shaping minds.
